Home.title: Frontend Developer React and Next.js
Home.text:
Frontend web developer, I use React, Next.js, and TypeScript to design modern and responsive interfaces.

I also have knowledge in back-end development with PostgreSQL, Node.js, and Prisma, allowing me to understand the entire web development process.
Home.contact: Whether it’s for a project, a collaboration, or just to connect, feel free to reach out!

aboutContent.title: Background and Career Change
aboutContent.content: After 10 years in the automotive industry, evolving from technician to team leader, I developed strong team management and problem-solving skills. Passionate about web development, I undertook a career change in 2023 through OpenClassrooms, training in frontend technologies like React, Next.js and TypeScript, combining my technical rigor with my new passion.

aboutContent.title: Continuous Learning / Technology Watch
aboutContent.content: My technology watch is mainly done through LinkedIn and X (Twitter), complemented by following tech conferences. I maintain my skills by regularly taking on integration challenges on Frontend Mentor and practicing weekly katas on Exercism and CodeWars to improve my programming logic.

aboutContent.title: Availability and Job Search
aboutContent.content: Actively looking, I am available for permanent positions, fixed-term contracts or freelance assignments. Flexible on working arrangements (remote, on-site or hybrid), I am open to all types of projects to put my frontend development skills into practice.

aboutContent.title: Location
aboutContent.content: Based in Haute-Savoie near the Swiss border, I am actively seeking opportunities in Geneva and its surroundings.

home.title: Jérémie Lavergnat - Front End Developer React and Next.js
home.description: Jérémie Lavergnat - Frontend developer specializing in React and Next.js, I design high-performance and optimized interfaces. Passionate about fullstack development, I am constantly seeking new challenges.

gus.title: GitHub User Search
gus.description:
Modern web application for GitHub users search built with Next.js. This application integrates with GitHub's REST API to provide a smooth and efficient user experience.

Key features:

• Responsive interface with pixel-perfect integration following Frontend Mentor's Figma designs

• Implementation of a dynamic theme system (light/dark) with automatic system preferences detection

blog.title: Blog and Devtools
blog.description:
Fullstack platform combining a technical blog and a suite of development tools.

Architecture:

• Headless backend with Sanity.io for content management

• Next.js frontend with ISR generation for new articles

• Search engine using GROQ queries for the blog and standard API for tools

finance.title: Personal Finance App
finance.description:
Financial management application under development.

Key features:

• Interactive dashboard with various data visualization

• Categorization system for transactions / savings / bills

• Authentication system via NextAuth (upcoming)

• Data management through PostgreSQL database (upcoming)

• Responsive interface following Frontend Mentor's Figma designs
